attributes.review: Very bad don’t download there was a big picture of Jonathan Galindo and then my phone turned off and then when it turned back on tiktok was deleted.... very bad experience ~ Frank ocean 🌊

attributes.title: Yikes😳
attributes.review: I really hate this app. It’s very buggy and causes my phone to crash. I also wish I wasn’t forced to look at a racist and misogynistic man right when I open the app😔.

attributes.title: TRACK MY LOCATION????
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it didn’t ask me for my location. Then, later my phone told me it had been TRACKING MY LOCATION, even outside the app! It didn’t even ASK. Nasty.

attributes.title: This app makes no sense!
attributes.review: I thought this app would help me understand better why people love trump so much but nope! All he wants is for poor americans to donate money to his failing campaign. What a waste of time!

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This is the worst app in the world and kept making my phone crash and glitch this app should definitely be deleted

attributes.title: Worst app 👎🏽
attributes.review: If I could give 0 stars I would, this the most trash app all u see is a big peach everywhere n like what is this oompa loompa body built so that’s y it should be taken off 🙅🏽‍♀️

attributes.title: difficult to use
attributes.review: The way the app is set up just does not make any sense! do not recommend also gave my phone a virus

attributes.title: The worst
attributes.review: If I could give this app negative stars I would. My phone keeps crashing and closing out of all of my apps since I downloaded it.

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD!!
attributes.review: This app took approximately three weeks to download. I don’t know why tho. It also lags really bad when it finally uploads tho. Don’t download this. I honestly have no more words left😤.

attributes.title: Delete this man
attributes.review: Wish I could leave lower than one star but whatever it takes to get this app removed
